channel.title: External hdd
channel.description:
[s]Today my external hdd case and my 1 Tb hdd arrived, and now I have to format it. But this takes ages, I started at about 14:30 and now (17:30) I'm at 29% and 33% (I made 2 partitions). Does this really has to take that long? 10% An hour?[/s]
[s]Edit: Woops, I forgot to tick the quick format box. This can be locked now.[/s]
Edit 2: Forget all previous. I got it to work, and I copied a rarred dvd to it. But now when I try to unrar it, it says that it can't and that it has to be unrarred on the previous disk. WTH is this?

item.title: External hdd
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I did, and it only gives problems with this particular one. It’s probably damaged.

Read full topic

item.title: External hdd
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

test it with other rar files

Read full topic

item.title: External hdd
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

NTFS, just as my internal hdd. It is possible that some rar files are damaged though.

Read full topic

item.title: External hdd
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There should be no reason for that, are you sure you have enough space (the only reason you may not is if you formatted it wrong) What filesystem did you go with?

Read full topic

item.title: External hdd
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Today my external hdd case and my 1 Tb hdd arrived, and now I have to format it. But this takes ages, I started at about 14:30 and now (17:30) I’m at 29% and 33% (I made 2 partitions). Does this really has to take that long? 10% An hour?

Edit: Woops, I forgot to tick the quick format box. This can be locked now.

Edit 2: Forget all previous. I got it to work, and I copied a rarred dvd to it. But now when I try to unrar it, it says that it can’t and that it has to be unrarred on the previous disk. WTH is this?

Read full topic
